00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_DISTINCT_VALUES_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_DISTINCT_VALUES_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <vector>
00013 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/checking/constants.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/checking/container.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/chain/chain.hpp>
00018 
00019 namespace boost{
00020 namespace assign{ 
00021 namespace v2{
00022 namespace checking{
00023 namespace chain{
00024 namespace distinct_values{
00025 
00026 // If the value types of the two ranges differ, their references must be 
00027 // converted to value_type. In particular, lvalue cannot be preserved.
00028 
00029 #define m(T1,T2)                                                                                                                           \
00030     template<typename T>                                                                                                           \
00031     void do_check(typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_same<T,T1> >::type* = 0) \
00032     {                                                                                                                                              \
00033         typedef T1 t1_;                                                                                                            \
00034         typedef T2 t2_;                                                                                                            \
00035         typedef std::vector<T1> vec1_;                                         \
00036         typedef std::vector<T2> vec2_;                                         \
00037         vec1_ vec1, vec3;                                                      \
00038         vec2_ vec2;                                                            \
00039         {                                                                                                                                      \
00040             namespace ns = v2::checking::constants;                                        \
00041             vec1.push_back( ns::a );                                                                           \
00042             vec1.push_back( ns::b );                                                                           \
00043             vec2.push_back( ns::c );                                                                           \
00044             vec2.push_back( ns::d );                                                                           \
00045             vec2.push_back( ns::e );                                                                           \
00046             vec3.push_back( ns::f );                                                                           \
00047             vec3.push_back( ns::g );                                                                           \
00048             vec3.push_back( ns::h );                                                                           \
00049         }                                                                                                                                      \
00050         namespace chk = checking::container;                                   \
00051         {                                                                      \
00052                 using namespace adaptor;                                                                                   \
00053                 chk::do_check( vec1 | _chain( vec2 ) | _chain( vec3 ) );           \
00054         }                                                                      \
00055     }                                                                                                                              \
00056 
00057 
00058 
00059 m(short  , int)
00060 m(int    , long)
00061 m(float  , double)
00062 m(double , long double)
00063 
00064 #undef m
00065 
00066 }// distinct_values
00067 }// chain
00068 }// checking
00069 }// v2
00070 }// assign
00071 }// boost
00072 
00073 #endif
